sub_title: Academic, education and English training specialist
summary:
I am a qualified and experienced teacher, trainer, and manager, with a commitment to learning and development, I am interested in contributing my skills to enhance the lives and experiences of others. I am a passionate educator, focused on delivering responsive learning and development (L&D) to achieve individualsâ€™ self-realisation, and organisational goals. 

With almost 20 years experience of working in international postings from Asia, and Europe to the Middle East; I have a high level of intercultural awareness. I hold a BA Hons in Youth and community work studies, and an MA in Teacher Training (TESOL). I have completed various professional training courses related to teaching, management, and student development. I am currently taking a second MA in International Development, and a CIPD certificate in L&D. 

I have managed staff development projects from inception to conclusion for a range of partners. I led staff teams, analyzed results; oversaw budgets, and resource allocation, and evaluated the impact of our work. I have demonstrated success in staff development, managing projects, and business development for L&D programmes. I teach communication and language development online and face-to-face to both children and adults with varying personal and professional goals.
